named-query.name: AccountingType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from AccountingType t order by t.id

named-query.name: AccountingType.findByName
named-query.query: select t from AccountingType t where t.name=:name

named-query.name: AccountingType.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from AccountingType t where t.code=:code

named-query.name: Company.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Company t order by t.id

named-query.name: Company.findByName
named-query.query: select t from Company t where t.name=:name

named-query.name: Company.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from Company t where t.code=:code

named-query.name: Company.findByTin
named-query.query: select t from Company t where t.tin=:tin
